00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00028 #include <l4/sys/thread.h>
00029 
00030 namespace L4 {
00031 
00038 class Thread : public Kobject_t<Thread, Kobject, L4_PROTO_THREAD>
00039 {
00040   L4_KOBJECT(Thread)
00041 
00042 public:
00047   l4_msgtag_t ex_regs(l4_addr_t ip, l4_addr_t sp,
00048                       l4_umword_t flags,
00049                       l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00050   { return l4_thread_ex_regs_u(cap(), ip, sp, flags, utcb); }
00051 
00056   l4_msgtag_t ex_regs(l4_addr_t *ip, l4_addr_t *sp,
00057                       l4_umword_t *flags,
00058                       l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00059   { return l4_thread_ex_regs_ret_u(cap(), ip, sp, flags, utcb); }
00060 
00061 
00070   class Attr
00071   {
00072   private:
00073      friend class L4::Thread;
00074      l4_utcb_t *_u;
00075 
00076    public:
00082      explicit Attr(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw() : _u(utcb)
00083      { l4_thread_control_start_u(utcb); }
00084 
00091      void pager(Cap<void> const &pager) throw()
00092      { l4_thread_control_pager_u(pager.cap(), _u); }
00093 
00099      Cap<void> pager() throw()
00100      { return Cap<void>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_u)->mr[1]); }
00101 
00108      void exc_handler(Cap<void> const &exc_handler) throw()
00109      { l4_thread_control_exc_handler_u(exc_handler.cap(), _u); }
00110 
00116      Cap<void> exc_handler() throw()
00117      { return Cap<void>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_u)->mr[2]); }
00118 
00130      void bind(l4_utcb_t *thread_utcb, Cap<Task> const &task) throw()
00131      { l4_thread_control_bind_u(thread_utcb, task.cap(), _u); }
00132 
00136      void alien(int on) throw()
00137      { l4_thread_control_alien_u(_u, on); }
00138 
00143      void ux_host_syscall(int on) throw()
00144      { l4_thread_control_ux_host_syscall_u(_u, on); }
00145 
00146    };
00147 
00152   l4_msgtag_t control(Attr const &attr) throw()
00153   { return l4_thread_control_commit_u(cap(), attr._u); }
00154 
00161   l4_msgtag_t switch_to(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00162   { return l4_thread_switch_u(cap(), utcb); }
00163 
00171   l4_msgtag_t stats_time(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00172   { return l4_thread_stats_time_u(cap(), utcb); }
00173 
00179   l4_msgtag_t vcpu_resume_start(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00180   { return l4_thread_vcpu_resume_start_u(utcb); }
00181 
00187   l4_msgtag_t vcpu_resume_commit(l4_msgtag_t tag,
00188                                  l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00189   { return l4_thread_vcpu_resume_commit_u(cap(), tag, utcb); }
00190 
00194    l4_msgtag_t vcpu_control(l4_addr_t vcpu_state, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb())
00195      throw()
00196    { return l4_thread_vcpu_control_u(cap(), vcpu_state, utcb); }
00197 
00201    l4_msgtag_t vcpu_control_ext(l4_addr_t ext_vcpu_state,
00202                                 l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00203    { return l4_thread_vcpu_control_ext_u(cap(), ext_vcpu_state, utcb); }
00204 
00210   l4_msgtag_t register_del_irq(Cap<Irq> irq, l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) throw()
00211   { return l4_thread_register_del_irq_u(cap(), irq.cap(), u); }
00212 
00220   class Modify_senders
00221   {
00222   private:
00223     friend class Thread;
00224     l4_utcb_t *utcb;
00225     unsigned cnt;
00226 
00227   public:
00228     explicit Modify_senders(l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) throw()
00229     : utcb(u), cnt(1)
00230     {
00231       l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_THREAD_MODIFY_SENDER;
00232     }
00233 
00249     int add(l4_umword_t match_mask, l4_umword_t match,
00250             l4_umword_t del_bits, l4_umword_t add_bits) throw()
00251     {
00252       l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00253       if (cnt >= L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 4)
00254         return -L4_ENOMEM;
00255       m->mr[cnt++] = match_mask;
00256       m->mr[cnt++] = match;
00257       m->mr[cnt++] = del_bits;
00258       m->mr[cnt++] = add_bits;
00259       return 0;
00260     }
00261   };
00262 
00270   l4_msgtag_t modify_senders(Modify_senders const &todo) throw()
00271   {
00272     return l4_ipc_call(cap(), todo.utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_THREAD, todo.cnt, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00273   }
00274 };
00275 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
